query:

ADD COLUMN jointEfficiency DECIMAL(4,2) AFTER allowableStress,
ADD COLUMN radiographyType VARCHAR(50) AFTER jointEfficiency,
ADD COLUMN specificGravity DECIMAL(10,4) AFTER radiographyType;
